pageContext.claim: “On November 4th, you won't be hearing so much about it. Okay? November 4th. On November 4th, you'll hear, "It's getting better. It's getting better." You watch. No, no, they're doing heavy COVID because they wanna scare people and, uh, people.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely suggests the media is covering the pandemic to deny him re-election. The novel coronavirus, which causes the disease known as Covid-19, is an ongoing global pandemic. The virus’s progression is in no way tied to the U.S. presidential election. With deaths soaring after the election, covid-19 remained page one news.
